sentences.en: Breathing asbestos - laden air may be hazardous to health.
sentences.cn: 呼吸充满了石棉的空气可能对健康有害.

sentences.en: Eating in East Berlin used to be a hazardous and joyless experience.
sentences.cn: 在东柏林就餐曾经是一件危险而且沉闷无趣的事情。

sentences.en: Everybody said that it was a hazardous investment.
sentences.cn: 大家都说那是一次危险的投资.

sentences.en: German law forbids the dumping of hazardous waste on German soil.
sentences.cn: 德国法律禁止在德国本土倾倒有害废料。

sentences.en: In this area arable farming is a hazardous practice.
sentences.cn: 在这个地区,可耕种的作物完全是碰运气的.

sentences.en: Its principal purpose is the cleanup of leaking hazardous waste disposal sites.
sentences.cn: 它的主要目的是清理危险性废物处置场地的渗漏.

sentences.en: Many sites receive hazardous wastes from a variety of generators and transporters.
sentences.cn: 许多场地可能从各种各样废物的产出者和运输者那里接受危险的废物.

sentences.en: Passive smoking can be hazardous to health.
Saunas can be hazardous if misused. Avoid a big meal beforehand.
sentences.cn: 洗桑拿浴如果方法不当会有危险，浴前切忌饱食。

sentences.en: She developed a taste for journeys to isolated hazardous regions in North America.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢上了到北美那些险象环生的偏远地区旅行。

sentences.en: Smoking is hazardous to your health.
Surface water made driving conditions hazardous.
sentences.cn: 路面积水对行车安全构成隐患.

sentences.en: These conditions are very hazardous for shipping.
sentences.cn: 这些情况对航海非常不利.

sentences.en: They are particularly hazardous to Salmonella control.
sentences.cn: 他们对沙门氏菌的控制特别不利.

sentences.en: Third, the Act creates a Hazardous Substances Trust Fund to pay for removal and remedial actions.
sentences.cn: 第三, 法案设立了“危险物质信托基金”,用以支付迁移和补偿行为.

words.tran_cn: 赌运气；冒…的危险，使遭受危险
有危险的；冒险的；碰运气的

trans.tran_cn: 冒险的，有危险的，碰运气的
trans.tran_en: dangerous, especially to people’s health or safety
